short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A custom toolbar which collects users' mood while they are using social media

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is developed as part of a dissertation to understand when users quit their social media session and what factors come into play when the user decides to quit.

METHOD
 - Change mood slider immediately to give me a START mood when you start a session
 - USE LEFT/RIGHT ARROW KEYBOARD KEYS to change your mood accordingly throughout the session
 - BEFORE ENDING THE SESSION, CLICK ON THE ICON BELOW ADDRESS BAR TO ENTER REASON FOR QUITTING
 - Remember to give me END mood before ending the session

****Minimise Keyboard shortcuts while using the social media*****
